actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Administration of the Federal Energy Administration to study and develop methods whereby agricultural crops and their byproducts may be employed as an alternate source of energy.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration to study and develop methods whereby agricultural crops and their by products may be employed as an alternate source of energy. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Administration of the Federal Energy Administration to study and develop methods whereby agricultural crops and their byproducts may be employed as an alternate source of energy.
